description.value: Requirement A sneak can’t use this reaction while encumbered. Trigger The sneak is hit or critically hit by an attack made by a creature the sneak can see. Effect The sneak gains a +2 circumstance bonus to their Armor Class against the triggering attack.
The sneak isn’t flat-footed to hidden, undetected, or flanking creatures of 6th level or lower, or creatures of 6th level or lower using surprise attack.
When the sneak takes a Stride action to move half their Speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions.

Requirements The sneak has manacles in hand and is adjacent to a creature. Effect The sneak attempts to bind the creature’s wrists or ankles with the manacles. If the sneak succeeds at an attack roll with a +16 modifier against the target’s AC, they apply the manacles.
In the first round of combat, creatures that haven’t acted yet are flat-footed to the sneak.
